duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a key resource on all aspects of annual budgeting, ensuring accuracy and timeliness of department budget information reports
Articulate all deviations to the annual budget to Management and perform analysis
Perform monthly analytics to explain actual vs. projected expenses and assist with modeling out projected expenses for various departments
Complete monthly payments and accrual entries, and provide technical support for the budget system
Assist with budget and expense reforecasts, and provide technical assistance for budget and actual headcount reports
Complete key performance indicator reports, assist with review of cost center allocations, and conduct monthly 'actual vs. budget' variance analysis

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field (Master's preferred)
